title: # 470 - Taylor Tomlinson & ME
description:
Today I sit down with comedian Taylor Tomlinson. We talk about touring, adapting during covid, what makes us spiral, TikTok, OCD, and much more! 

 

For all of Taylor’s tour dates go to https://ttomcomedy.com 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Tushy. Go to http://www.hellotushy.com/BERTCAST to get 10% off your order and FREE shipping

 

This episode is also brought to you by Hello Fresh. Go to Http://www.HelloFresh.com/bertcast14 and use code “bertcast14” for 14 free meals, including free shipping!

 

This episode is also brought to you by Better Help. Get 10% off your first month with the discount code “BERT”. Get started today at http://www.betterhelp.com/bert 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Credit Karma. Go to http://www.creditKarma.com/podcast and find offers tailored just for you.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Stat Hero. Sign up for free at http://www.stathero.com/Bertcast and get a 300% match!

 

This episode is also brought to you by Liquid IV. Get 25% off when you go to http://www.liquidiv.com and use the code “Bert” at checkout. 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
